traits.name: Defensive Advantage
entries: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not {@condition incapacitated}, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Touch of Madness
entries: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
entries: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
